content.query:
CREATE CREDENTIAL [cosmostaqlwoz1]
 WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
 SECRET = '---'
 GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmostaqlwoz1;Database=AdventureWorks',
                OBJECT = 'Sales',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmostaqlwoz1'
) AS [Sales]
